title: vkax-project
author: vkax-project
created_time: July 08, 2022, 01:26:29 AMLast edit: July 08, 2022, 01:39:15 AM by vkax-project
content: Introduction To VKAXVkax is an experimental project which is born out of the need to create easy mining algorithm that are user friendly and devoid of asic mining. It uses its own algorithm called ‘Mike’ a variant of ghostrider algorithm. Its a digital experimental currency that enables instant, private payments to anyone at any time of the day with no limitations. Vkax uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Vkax Core is the name of the open source software which enables the use of this currency. Vkax is a complete fork of Dash coin which uses Masternodes and other technology to secure its blockchainThis project is created to bridge the gap that other crypto have closed. It is born out of the need to create easy mining algorithm that are user friendly and devoid of asic mining. It uses its own algorithm called ‘Mike’ a variant of ghostrider algorithm. Its a digital experimental currency that uses fast, private and secure payments to anyone at any time of the day with no limitations. Vkax uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority like dash etc: managing transactions and issuing money are carried out collectively by the network. Vkax Core is the best in crypto transactions and it is an open open source software. Vkax is a complete fork of Dash coin which uses Masternodes and other technology to secure its blockchain.Mining Vkax uses the mike’s algorithm which is a variant of the ghostrider algorithm and uses a smooth difficulty processRewardMining of vkax gives out the sum of 10,000 VKAX out of which 2,500 goes to Masternode owners. This 10,000 VKAX would stay until height 1950005 and within that period subsidy at every block height 210240 would take place. After height 1950005 reward would fall back to 500 VKAX and so on.Links:Explorer: https://explorer.vkax.xyz/Site: https://www.vkax.xyz/Wallets: https://github.com/vkaxproject/vkax/releases/tag/v0.17.0.3Discord: https://discord.gg/4gtHMX893n

comments.author: kamelbendali
comments.body: Any pool ? the core refuses to generate ! Any way to mine it ?

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: I have mined over 9 million as I have counted. The wallet balance keeps dropping by more than half. At 10:15am EST my balance was 5,425,000. This is after it dropped the wallet balance by more than half at 4:30am this morning. At 12:44pm the balance showed 1,935,000. What in the world is going on? I hope you can answer this for me. If not I will have to abandon this project and would encourage other to do the same. I hope I am wrong.

comments.author: Bacardi Toni
comments.body: It is bad that there is no mining software for the algorithm.No miner == no pool

comments.author: neonil
comments.body: Quote from: SpeedyDale08 on July 08, 2022, 04:56:59 PMHi what miner do you use to mine VkaxI went into their discord, and was told wait, a pool would be coming. They said that more than 24 hours ago. Right now, while the difficulty is low, they are not sharing the miner publicly.Not a fair start.The website is more than broken.Total pump and dump. Don't waste your time.

comments.body: Quote from: Bacardi Toni on July 08, 2022, 05:34:54 PMIt is bad that there is no mining software for the algorithm.No miner == no pool  There is mining software. The devs do not wish to share it.

comments.author: crackfoo
comments.created_time: September 06, 2022, 05:31:57 PMLast edit: November 04, 2022, 09:38:12 PM by crackfoo
comments.body: Hi, We've added Vkax (VKAX) to http://zpool.ca/algo/mike. See below for connection details.Fee only: 0.5% or lessBTC payouts are processed once a day for balances above 0.0015Payouts for all other currencies are made automatically every 4 hours for balances above 0.05 and balances more than 0.0125 are included in one of the payouts each day.- Sample configurations -To mine mike and get paid in VKAX:Code:-a mike -o stratum+tcp://mike.mine.zpool.ca:5356 -u VKAX_ADDRESS -p c=VKAX,zap=VKAX All of our ports are NiceHash friendly, no need to specify any extra detailsSSL/TLS is available for all ports. Simply prepend the port with a 5. Example for mike: 55356==============================Support: https://discord.gg/n45n6Jj Twitter: https://twitter.com/_zpool_

comments.author: gyIQ
comments.body: hello,Wallett stopped syncing ~10 days ago.Then I installed 18.0.1, then 18.0.3 and the result is the same, it can't sync with the network.Tried wallet repair recan 1-2 and repair 1-2, without luck.On the pool I can see the payments, but right now I've got no access to my coins.sent a mail to developer@vkax.xyz, but email came back:554 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: undeliverable address: host mail-outgoing.relay-pe.svc.cluster.local[10.27.8.70] said: 550 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: User unknown in virtual mailbox table (in reply to RCPT TO command)Final-Recipient: rfc822; developer@vkax.xyzAction: failedStatus: 5.1.1Remote-MTA: dns; mx1.privateemail.com. (198.54.122.240, the server for the domain vkax.xyz.)Diagnostic-Code: smtp; 554 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: undeliverable address: host mail-outgoing.relay-pe.svc.cluster.local[10.27.8.70] said: 550 5.1.1 <developer@vkax.xyz>: Recipient address rejected: User unknown in virtual mailbox table (in reply to RCPT TO command)Last-Attempt-Date: Thu, 29 Sep 2022 03:21:07 -0700 (PDT)Dev, pls advise how to fix this and or provide a working email where Ican send the debug.log.Thx
